name: Lost Alone In The Forest.
description:
Lost Alone In The Forest. In this game the player has to find objects to finish the game BEFORE NIGHT COMES... -Controls-
  • W = Move Forward
  • A = Move Left
  • S = Move Backward
  • D = Move Right
  • Space = Jump
  • Alt + f4 = Exit Game
-About- I made this game to learn how to make a game story for my next game, if you have any suggestions for my game, please combo me with your magical comments... I made this game in less than 2 days, so there are still many bugs in this game, sorry for the bugs in my game =( This game can be finished in just a few minutes, and is not suitable for making youtube video content/video commentaries... sorry =(
